content.prompt: The darkest shading on the map indicates the areas with the highest population densities. Which of the following statements best describes the pattern of population density shown?

choices.label: Manhattan appears to have the lowest population density at all three scales.
New York Cityâ€™s hinterlands have the highest population density.
Population densities appear to be uniform at all three scales.
New York City and New York State have similar population densities.
Manhattan appears to have the highest population density at all three scales.

skill.text: Skill 5.A: Identify the scales of analysis presented by maps, quantitative and geospatial data, images, and landscapes.
